name: STBL-Game
description:
In the year 1950 on a planet Earth of a parallel universe, where the first and second world wars never existed, six factions became aware of some revolutionary scientific information.

Whether true or false this is not known, but the only certain thing is their alien origin.

The 6 factions immediately set out in search of these extraordinary finds, unleashing a war that has been going on for decades, called “The long war”.

Between extraordinary discoveries, military espionage and cannon shots, everyone tries to bring order by defeating the weakest in battles at the last Tank.
